home.heroTitle: Ka Bogo Qotada Badweynta la Jir SEVSEA DIVERS
home.heroSubtitle: Kashif quruxda dunida hoosteeda biyaha leh dalxiisyo iyo dabaal-baaris la hagayo.
home.aboutHeading: Albaabkaaga u furma dunida hoosteeda biyaha
home.aboutDescription: Sevsea Divers waxaan u heellanahay inaan kula wadaagno mucjisooyinka badda...
home.stepsTitle: GAL DUNIDA BIIYOHA HOOSTEEDA 3 TALAABO OO SAHLAN!!!
home.learnDesc: Baro sida loo quuso! Isdiiwaangeli koorsada!
home.diveDesc: Ku quuso koorsooyin fudud oo loogu talagalay bilowga!
home.exploreDesc: Baro quusitaanka oo sahamin 71% kale ee dhulka!
